snippet: But Newt Gingrich promises to make English the official language of government.
abstract: But Newt Gingrich promises to make English the official language of government.
lead_paragraph: WALFORD, Iowa - Newt Gingrich promises to make English the official language of government, but on Monday he sent an e-mail appeal in Spanish asking for support at the Iowa caucuses.

headline.main: Gingrich Sends an E-mail in Spanish, Asking for Support in Iowa
